entry.title: Ethereum Classic Hits 4-Month High as Merge Approaches
entry.summary: The upswing in ETC’s price coincides with the upswing of ETH.

entry.title: Celsius Creditors Move to Block Company From Selling Mined Bitcoin
entry.summary: Celsius creditors have also filed a statement calling CEO Alex Mashinsky's assurances to customers "empty and false promises."

entry.title: Taiwan Turns to Ethereum IPFS Tech to Thwart Chinese Cyberattacks
entry.summary: As tensions with China heat up, Taipei officials leverage decentralized publishing and storage to stay online.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried: 'Disappointing' Others Haven’t Helped Us Give Bailouts
entry.summary: The FTX CEO said he doesn't want to be the only one bailing out ailing crypto companies, but hasn't gotten any help from other healthy players.

entry.title: MakerDAO Founder Calls on DAI to Drop Dollar Peg Amid Tornado Cash Fallout
entry.summary: Over 50% of DAI is currently collateralized by Circle’s USDC.

entry.title: Ethereum Merge May Be Coming Sooner Than Expected
entry.summary: The merge is now expected to take place on September 15 or 16, according to a call today among Ethereum developers.

entry.title: BlackRock Launches Spot Bitcoin Private Trust
entry.summary: The $10 trillion asset manager said it’s also exploring “permissioned blockchains, stablecoins, cryptoassets, and tokenization.”

entry.title: DeFi Exchange dYdX Blocking Addresses Associated With Tornado Cash
entry.summary: The exchange took decisive action to block crypto addresses associated with Tornado Cash following this week’s sanctions blow from the U.S.

entry.title: Curve ‘Strongly Suggests’ Domain Migration to Ethereum Name Service After $570K Frontend Hack
entry.summary: A post-mortem from Curve Finance reported that “no one is safe” from frontend attacks like the one the DeFi exchange suffered on Tuesday.

entry.title: Swan Bitcoin Discloses Data Leak Due to Phishing Attack on Newsletter Provider
entry.summary: Crypto trading app Swan Bitcoin is among dozens of crypto businesses affected by a data breach suffered by email marketing firm Klaviyo.

entry.title: DeFi Token Powering Ethereum Staker Lido Finance Jumps 18%
entry.summary: The token backing popular Ethereum staker Lido jumped double-digits after the final test before the merge next month.

entry.title: Did The US Government Just Declare War on Crypto?
entry.summary: Experts assess the implications of the Treasury Department’s sanctioning of privacy protocol Tornado Cash earlier this week.

entry.title: Ethereum Up 14% as Goerli Testnet Merge Goes Live
entry.summary: Ethereum has just completed the network’s final dress rehearsal before the Merge event slated for September.

entry.title: Mailchimp Resumes Crackdown on Crypto Newsletters Including Messari, Edge
entry.summary: Another round of unannounced account suspensions leaves crypto newsletter publishers scrambling to choose a new provider.

entry.title: As CryptoPunks NFT Owners Get Commercial Rights, Yuga Hopes to Secure Their ‘Legacy as Artwork'
entry.summary: Noah Davis, who joined from auction house Christie’s, tells Decrypt about Yuga Labs’ plans for the influential Ethereum NFT project.

entry.title: Ripple Is Considering Buying Bankrupt Crypto Lender Celsius’ Assets: Report
entry.summary: Ripple is actively seeking to scale the company through merger and acquisition deals, a spokesperson told Reuters.

entry.title: Who’s Firing—And Still Hiring—During the Bitcoin Bear Market
entry.summary: Some crypto companies are feeling the crunch of a market crash and reducing their employee headcount to cope—but others are still expanding and securing fresh talent. Here's who's hiring and firing in crypto right now.

entry.title: Binance Is Not Ruling Out Support for Ethereum Proof-of-Work Fork
entry.summary: The exchange said it would “evaluate” whether or not to list ETHW.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Rise Following Flat Inflation Reading
entry.summary: The recent CPI report suggests that inflation in the U.S. may have peaked after rising at its fastest pace in four decades.

entry.title: German Crypto Bank Nuri Files for Insolvency, Says ‘All Funds Are Safe’
entry.summary: Despite filing for insolvency, Berlin-based digital banking platform Nuri insists all funds in user accounts are safe.

entry.title: Canada's 2nd Largest Pension Fund Embroiled in Celsius Collapse
entry.summary: The size of the losses have sparked a joint investigation into Celsius’ demise by Canadian regulators and the SEC across the border.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried: Voyager Deal Likely ‘$70M Down the Drain’
entry.summary: The FTX CEO is brutally honest in his assessment of his Voyager deal, but added that he can only aim for "OK" rather than "amazing" bailout deals.

entry.title: Elliptic Rolls Out Crypto-Bridge Screening Tool to Track Illicit Funds
entry.summary: Elliptic’s new screening product will better track cross-chain activity, helping crypto firms stay compliant.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange CoinFLEX Plans $84M Restructuring in Seychelles
entry.summary: Beleaguered cryptocurrency exchange CoinFLEX has reportedly initiated a restructuring process in a Seychelles court.

entry.title: Coinbase Betting Big On Staking Ahead of Ethereum Merge
entry.summary: The company aims to be the top provider of staking services and already considers it an “early win.”

entry.title: Ethereum DeFi Exchange Curve Suffers Frontend Hack
entry.summary: Cybercriminals made off with $570,000 in Ethereum, some of it since frozen, before a fix was announced.

entry.title: Magic Eden Wants to Build an ApeCoin NFT Marketplace Just for Bored Apes—Here’s Why
entry.summary: As the top Solana NFT marketplace pushes into Ethereum, it wants to build a trading platform for Bored Apes—with benefits for holders.

entry.title: Coinbase Posts $1 Billion Net Loss in Q2, Stock Tumbles
entry.summary: Trading volume on the exchange fell by 29% in the second quarter.

entry.title: Circle's USDC Will Not Support an Ethereum Proof-of-Work Fork
entry.summary: Circle insists it’s doing “the right thing,” advocating for the new chain's development amid growing discussions of yet another Ethereum fork.

entry.title: Tornado Cash User 'Dusts' Hundreds of Public Wallets—Including Celebs Jimmy Fallon, Steve Aoki and Logan Paul
entry.summary: Tornado cash was banned yesterday. But now a naughty user is proving this ban may be difficult to enforce.

entry.title: Ethereum Cofounder Says He Used Now-Blacklisted Tornado Cash to Donate to Ukraine
entry.summary: Vitalik Buterin said the need for privacy from Russia’s government led him to use the Ethereum mixing protocol.

entry.title: Binance Shutters ‘Off-Chain Fund Transfer’ Path to WazirX Exchange
entry.summary: Amid an investigation into WazirX, Binance and its CEO have continued to distance the firm from the India-based crypto exchange.

entry.title: Reddit Rolls Out Community Points on Arbitrum’s New Ethereum Scaler With FTX Support
entry.summary: Arbitrum’s new gaming and social dapp-centric Nova chain is live, and Reddit could bring millions of users to it via rewards. FTX is also on board.

entry.title: 'It Doesn’t Change Anything' Says Tornado Cash After Code Disappears From GitHub
entry.summary: The source code for crypto privacy mixer Tornado Cash has been removed from Github, prompting outcry from privacy and free speech advocates.

entry.title: New NFT Privacy Proposal Gets Vitalik Buterin’s Attention
entry.summary: A new proposal would see a new ERC-721 extension use stealth addresses to obscure NFT transactions on the Ethereum network.

entry.title: Crypto Miner Marathon Increased Bitcoin Holdings Amid $191.6M Quarterly Losses
entry.summary: Bitcoin miner Marathon Digital increased its Bitcoin holdings by 707 despite a quarterly decline in production.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange Zipmex to Re-Open Bitcoin, Ethereum Withdrawals
entry.summary: The next round of crypto withdrawals will give a majority of Zipmex clients the ability to withdraw Ethereum and Bitcoin.

entry.title: Bad Bitcoin Bettor Dave Portnoy Rages Over SafeMoon Lawsuit
entry.summary: The internet celebrity’s bad luck crypto investment streak continues.

entry.title: Dogecoin Has More Potential Applications Than Cardano: Mark Cuban
entry.summary: The billionaire investor shared his view on Cardano's lack of adoption, market caps, and Dogecoin on a recent podcast.

entry.title: Crypto Leaders Decry “Tyranny” of Tornado Cash Ban
entry.summary: Privacy advocates took to Twitter to condemn the U.S. government’s ban of the popular coin mixing service.

entry.title: Why Musician and NFT Artist Jimmy Edgar Remains Skeptical on Music NFTs
entry.summary: Musician and NFT artist Jimmy Edgar is fully sold on NFT art, but not convinced yet on the uses of NFTs in the music world, he told Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Avalanche's John Wu Talks Institutional Interest and Use Cases
entry.summary: Ava Labs President John Wu sits for an extensive chat about institutional interest in crypto and DeFi (it has "absolutely not waned") and use cases of Avalanche with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Avalanche House in Brooklyn on July 15, 2022.

entry.title: Decrypt on the Street: Chipotle Says ‘Buy the Dip!’
entry.summary:
In our latest Decrypt on the Street segment, reporter Sander Lutz investigates Chipotle’s recent crypto marketing campaign and talks to Chipotle customers about their sadness amid the crypto crash.
Sander himself entered the contest hoping to get rich; instead he got a single cup of queso dip.

entry.title: How Civic Is Battling Web3 Bots and Spam: CPO JP Bedoya
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson reports from NFT Expoverse in LA with JP Bedoya, Chief Product Officer at Civic, the Web3 identity verification problem rolling out a new set of tools to keep people from spamming NFT drops to take advantage.

entry.title: gm: Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon is Finding the 'Soul' in Generative Art NFTs
entry.summary: Art Blocks, the generative NFT series, exploded in popularity and price last fall. Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon (aka "Snowfro") talks to Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves all about why the price surge actually hurt Art Blocks and the problem with NFT speculators, the debate over digital art vs. traditional art and his views on Bored Apes and CryptoPunks, how he got into NFTs after starting a physical tile business with his father, and why he thinks everyone's mortgage will eventually be stored on chain.

entry.title: Matthew Ball on the Role of Crypto and NFTs in the Metaverse
entry.summary: The former Amazon Studios exec and venture capitalist spoke with Decrypt’s Kate Irwin about how crypto fits into the metaverse at an event in Beverly Hills, California.

entry.title: gm: Binance CEO CZ Talks Bailouts, Regulator Demands, and Simulation Theory
entry.summary: In an extensive conversation with Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott, Binance CEO CZ talks global and US regulation, Binance HQ locations, crypto bailouts and how he approaches deals, the sports marketing push by big crypto exchanges and why Binance went slower, and why he believes we live in a simulation.
